actions.description: The lava child makes two attacks: one with its bite and one with its claws.
actions.name: Multiattack

actions.description: 6 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 11 (2d6 + 4) piercing damage.
actions.name: Bite

actions.description: 7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 7 (1d6 + 4) slashing damage.
actions.name: Claws

damageImmunities: fire; bludgeoning, piercing, slashing from metal weapons
name: Lava Child

specialTraits.description: The lava child can move through metal without hindrance, and it has advantage on attack rolls against any creature wearing metal armor or using a metal shield.
specialTraits.name: Metal Immunity
